name: St. Gregory of Narek

locations.description: Armenian monk and mystic at Narek Monastery

summary: Gregory of Narek was an Armenian monk, poet, and mystic known for his masterpiece 'Book of Lamentations' (Narek). He is a Doctor of the Church and is considered one of the greatest Armenian spiritual writers. His writings have had profound influence on Armenian spirituality and are still used in liturgical prayer.
